author: Joann Muller
title: Car-buying will never be the same after coronavirus
description: The coronavirus is changing how people buy cars and get them serviced — behaviors likely to last long after the pandemic is over. Why it matters: Confined by stay-at-home orders, people have discovered that getting a new car delivered is as easy as ordering g…
